author: Ben Cohen
title: LeBron James, the Warriors and How the Modern NBA Happened - WSJ
text:
Once upon a time, the NBA wasn’t cool.
It was only a decade ago that the game was slow, the style of play was ugly and the players themselves weren’t cultural icons. Twitter was something that birds did. But it already feels like such ancient history that NBA players could have been wearing short shorts.
